3.1 nakshathra porondama
ema granthawalata anuwa, mul ma janapadawasin, meki sanskruthikabhawayata path kirime kriyawaliyata mula piruwe ekko deshiya kandayam sanskruthika washayen siya samuhayata athulath kirimeni.

ee athara kanediyanu grand loj (1985)[12], batahira flatbora methodistha palliya (1879), podu pusthakalaya (1890) saha rayt hawus departhamenthu kotuwa (1893) we. 1877-1878 wasara thula kanediyanu palamu wanijya durakathana sewawa, prathama brithanya durakathana huwamaruwa saha dewana uthuru amarikanu durakathana huwamaruwa pihituwana ladi.

kalakata pera atham aprikanu, lathin amerikanu saha nagenahira yuropiya samajawadi ratawala pragathishili deshapalana nayakayan loka bala adhikariye poliskarayage bhumikawa wiwechanayata lak kalath ada ehi nawa diguwak lowata penwa dimata mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathiwaraya kriya kirima lokaye nawa deshapalana elambaumaka pilibimbauwak lesa handunwa dimata puluwana.aarakshawath manawa himikam surakshitha kirimath yanu wishwa sadharana dharmathawak wiya yuthu ya.

ee sandaha elambaena maha mathiwaranayedi kaluthara aasanaye siyalu denagema sahayogaya eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata laba diya yuthuyi.1997 warshaye di dodamgoda pradeshiya sabhawa, 1999 di basnahira palath sabhawa saha 2004 di parlimenthuwa dakwa ma pamini deshapalana gaman mange di pakshaya pata maru karagath deshapalanayak ma kale naha.kaluthara disthrikkaye sama kshethrayakama sanwardhanaya sandaha katayuthu kirimata mata hakiwuna.

manthriwaraya ema prakashaya kale, ohuge ‘aalapalu aarthikaya’ kruthiya prakashayata path kirime widwath hamuwedi. 2005 janadhipathiwaranaye di ‘mahinda chinthana’ prakashanaya magin yuddhaya awasan kirima saha aarthikaya shakthimath kirima kere awadhanaya yomu kara thibunath mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathiwarayata koti sanwidhanaya parajaya kirime uwamanawak thibinayi pawasima waradi adahasak dimak wana bawayi , parlimenthu manthri patali champika ranawaka kiya sitinne.
eeth ehi lokuwata wanchadushana thiyenawa.
